title: Accra kikuayana
text:
Accra kikuayana is a species of <a href="moth">moth</a> of the family <a href="Tortricidae">Tortricidae</a>. It is found in <a href="Kenya">Kenya</a> and
<a href="Nigeria">Nigeria</a>.
The <a href="wingspan">wingspan</a> is about 14 mm. The ground colour of the forewings is greyish green and the <a href="Glossary%20of%20entomology%20terms%23costa">costa</a> and <a href="Glossary%20of%20entomology%20terms%23termen">termen</a> are <a href="ochreous">ochreous</a>, as well as an edge and row of blackish dots along the <a href="Glossary%20of%20entomology%20terms%23apex">apex</a>. The markings are red.
